source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('Lookupoldwatermarkvalue').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupnewWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

select COUNT(*) as cnt from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('Lookupoldwatermarkvalue').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupnewWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as integer,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source aggregate(groupBy(Color,
		ProductName = Name),
	ListPrice = avg(ListPrice),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate
Aggregate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:['Aggregate.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Color,
		ProductName,
		ListPrice
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as integer,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ProductCategory.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceCategory
source aggregate(groupBy(Color,
		ProductName = Name,
		Category = ProductCategoryID),
	ListPrice = avg(ListPrice),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate
Aggregate, sourceCategory join(Category == ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joincategory
Joincategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:['AggregateJoin.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Color,
		ProductName,
		Category,
		ListPrice,
		Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> product
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourcecategory
product filter(like(Name,'HL%')) ~> Filterproductid
Filterproductid, sourcecategory join(product@ProductID == sourcecategory@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['filter.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = product@ProductID,
		Name = product@Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink

source(output(
		PersonID as string,
		Name as string,
		LastModifytime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source alterRow(updateIf(1==1),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		Name as string,
		LastModifytime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['PersonID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		Name,
		LastModifytime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinksql

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> productcategory
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> product
ModifyColumns1, product join(productcategory@ProductID == product@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
productcategory derive(Name = lower(Name)) ~> ModifyColumns1
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Join.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		rowguid = product@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = product@ModifiedDate,
		Name = ModifyColumns1@Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkblob

parameters{
	department as integer (1),
	dept_id as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		emp_id as short,
		Name as string,
		department as short,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		deptid as short,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(department == deptid,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
